overview: Drama critic Larry Mackay, his wife Kate and their four sons move from their crowded Manhattan apartment to an old house in the country. While housewife Kate settles into suburban life, Larry continues to enjoy the theater and party scene of New York.
tagline: The Uproarious Movie From The Big Best-Seller!
cast: Doris Day|David Niven|Janis Paige|Spring Byington|Richard Haydn
